Title: A Prairie Home Companion
Genre: Comedy, Drama, Music, Musical, Romance, Western
Writer: Garrison Keillor (screenplay), Garrison Keillor (story), Ken LaZebnik (story)
Actors: Marylouise Burke, Woody Harrelson, L.Q. Jones, Tommy Lee Jones
Plot: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.
